story.text: Walter grew up in [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/El_Campo,_Texas small town Texas], a [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Saint-Sauvant,_Charente-Maritime small town in France]],  the not so small [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Memphis_blues Memphis, Tennessee], a [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nye,_Montana small town in Montana], and a very smelly [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Washington,_D.C. Washington, DC]. Walter is done growing. So now he wants to build  [[Cities]].

Walter is an explorer, inventor and lawyer. He likes to fix broken things - like tractors, relationships, and [[Cities]]. He once built a [[log cabin in Montana]]. He is in the process of filing six patents based on his inventions. He plans to give all of his accumulated wealth away before he dies.
You can read [[why Walter is here]].
The ambitious can peruse his social media:

YOUTUBE OX2x-nnBnNU
It is weird that Walter ended by clapping at himself - despite his last name. He aims to never do that again.

You can find out more about me on the following social media platforms:
Walter is a fixer and builder. He likes to fix broken things - like tractors, relationships and governments. He once built a log cabin in Montana. Most recently, he graduated from law school.
[[Why Walter is Here]]

Walter is a fixer and builder. He likes to fix broken things - like tractors, relationships and governments. He once built a log cabin in Montana where he wired and plumbed all 2,700 square feet. Most recently, he graduated from law school and now is trying to find ways to sustain himself so that he may practice pro bono law exclusively.

Walter is a fixer and builder. He likes to fix broken things - like tractors, relationships and governments. He once led the construction of a log cabin in Montana where he wired and plumbed all 2,700 square feet. Most recently, he graduated from law school and now is trying to find ways to sustain himself so that he may practice pro bono law exclusively.
